mapper.select: SELECT dg.id,dg.roomid,infoid,dg.status,dg.name,dg.describes,r.name AS roomname,dgi.name AS typename,dgt.pic AS pic FROM devicegroup dg LEFT JOIN room r ON dg.roomid = r.id LEFT JOIN devicegroupinfo dgi ON dg.infoid = dgi.id LEFT JOIN devicegrouptype dgt ON dgi.type = dgt.id WHERE dg.roomid = ${_parameter}
